div.div: Ethics approval and consent to participate
div.p: As this study did not investigate health or diseases in patients, it is not regarded as a medical and health research project - and is thereby not affected by the Norwegian Health Research Act (ACT 2008-06-20 no. 44: Act on medical and health research, Chapter 1, §2 and §4) https://lovdata.no/dokument/NL/lov/2008-06-20-44. Approval from the Committee for medical and health research ethics was therefore not needed https://helseforskning.etikkom.no/?_ikbLanguageCode=us. The study was approved by the Norwegian Social Science Data Services – the governmental agency for protecting survey research respondent privacy according to the Norwegian Personal Data Act (Ref. No. 2015/42892). By filling in and returning the Safety Attitudes Questionnaire, the health care providers consented to participate.
